article.title: Northrop Grumman to Revitalize Hunter UAS in Support of War Effort
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corp., Technical Services, Inc., Sierra Vista, Arizona, was recently awarded a $47 million cost-plus-fixed-fee contract to provide capability-based rotations support for Operation Enduring Freedom/Operation Iraqi Freedom and revitalization for the Hunter unmanned aircraft system.Â Aviation & Missile Command Contracting Center, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
